explanation: [0-0] In an outdoor setting, a dirt yard features a tire in the middle. On the right are shadows of plants, and in the upper right corner is a house. A woman wearing a white short-sleeved shirt and blue shorts stands by the house, arms crossed, looking to the right. Green trees are visible in the upper left and beside the house.
[0-2] First, a hand wearing a bracelet moves down from the upper right, beckoning with its palm facing left. Then, the hand rotates to the left, with the palm facing right.
[0-2] First, a hand wearing a bracelet moves down from the upper right, beckoning with its palm facing left. Then, the hand rotates to the left, with the palm facing right.
[2-4] Then, a hand with red nail polish moves from the upper left to the right of the hand with the bracelet, and the two hands clasp their fingers together.
[2-4] Then, a hand with red nail polish moves from the upper left to the right of the hand with the bracelet, and the two hands clasp their fingers together.

[4-7] Finally, the two clasped hands move to the lower left. The woman in the white short-sleeved shirt runs over with her mouth open. The clasped hands separate as a man wearing a blue shirt and gray shorts walks in from the left. The man in the blue shirt stretches out his arms, takes the woman's hands, turns his head, and smiles forward. The woman smiles at the man in the blue shirt.
